title: Using WTFast and league of legends causes an unknown error
body:
Using WTFast makes an unknown error occur where the client gets stuck at "retrieving data from server:loading", while for normals you do connect to game however other users do not show to you as connected even through chat might work.

Any WTFast users might have a solution to this problem ?

replies.body: My advice don't use WTFast is it just a proxy with a cute name, it will increase ping.
